pageSubtitle: Manage your app and account settings.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the app.
blockedUsersDescription: Here's a list of users you've blocked. You can unblock them if needed.
languageDescription: Choose the language and region for your account.
accountDescription: Manage your profile details, security, and notification settings.
profileAndBillingDescription: Edit your personal info and payment methods.
securityDescription: Change your password and manage your security settings.
notificationsDescription: Set how you'd like to receive notifications.
authRequired: You need to be logged in to access this page.
billingPageDescription: Manage your payment methods, view your full payment history, and download invoices.

billing.historyDescription: Here's a list of all your past payments and invoices.
billing.noInvoicesDescription: Your payment history will show up here once you make your first purchase.
billing.detailsDescription: Make sure your billing address is up to date for correct invoices and tax calculations.
billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Manage your billing address and view your payment history.
billing.downloadError: Could not get the download link. Please try again.
billing.errorDescription: There was a problem getting your payment history. Please try again later.
billing.navigationDescription: Your billing details and payment history are managed on a dedicated page for clarity and security.
billing.navigationContent: Click the button below to manage your billing address, view your payment history, and download invoices.

insurance.title: Health Insurance Recognition
insurance.description: Manage your recognitions with health insurance providers and submit the necessary documents for verification.
insurance.isRecognizedLabel: My services are recognized by Swiss supplemental health insurances.
insurance.duplicateNameError: This registry name has already been added.
insurance.uploadSuccess: Document uploaded and submitted for review!
insurance.submissionFailed: Could not submit document to the platform.
